channel.title: code style on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in code style on Fresh Swift

item.title: Using Swiftlint to avoid conflict
item.description: As we know, there is no such thing as one true way of formatting code. This is especially evident when working on a team and submitting PRs. Luckily, SwiftLint can help us. William Boles describes his experience using it, and how it helped keep his team happy.
